entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
